name: In re ESTATE of Elizabeth C. SEIBERLICH, Deceased. Appeal of William C. SEIBERLICH, Jr.

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Elizabeth C. SEIBERLICH, Deceased. Appeal of William C. SEIBERLICH, Jr.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Appeal is quashed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Stewart J. Greenleaf, Norristown, for appellant.
Michael A. Paul, Media, for Mary A. Sullivan.
Marvin I. Block, Asst. Atty. Gen., for Commonwealth.
casebody.head_matter:
427 A.2d 648
In re ESTATE of Elizabeth C. SEIBERLICH, Deceased. Appeal of William C. SEIBERLICH, Jr.
No. 108.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 26, 1981.
Decided April 10, 1981.
Stewart J. Greenleaf, Norristown, for appellant.
Michael A. Paul, Media, for Mary A. Sullivan.
Marvin I. Block, Asst. Atty. Gen., for Commonwealth.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
